definition: to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span

sentences.english: Most of the global companies are moving manufacturing facilities out-side of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 大多數跨國公司都在把生產設備遷出日本。

sentences.english: Transnationalism designates a recent shift in migration bird patterns.
sentences.chinese: 跨國主義者指出了一個最近發生遷徙鳥類上的轉變。

sentences.english: The thesis mainly demonstrates the securitization from the perspective of Cross-Border.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要從跨國性的視角向讀者展示資產證券化。

sentences.english: Cross-national comparison can also shed light on this question.
sentences.chinese: 跨國間的比較能讓我們更好地理解這個問題。

sentences.english: I work for a branch in Xiamen of a multi-national company.
sentences.chinese: 我在一個跨國公司的廈門分公司工作。

sentences.english: Transnational capital flows are the main factors of the company's cross-border M & A.
sentences.chinese: 資本流動的跨國性是界定公司跨國併購的主要因素。

sentences.english: Transnational capital flows are the main factors of the company's cross-border M & A.
sentences.chinese: 資本流動的跨國性是界定公司跨國併購的主要因素。

sentences.english: Considerable cross-national convergence in life expectancy will occur.
sentences.chinese: 預期壽命將會出現可觀的跨國趨同。

sentences.english: One popular option for "gappers" is international volunteer work.
sentences.chinese: 但是，空檔年最流行的還是跨國志願者工作。

sentences.english: I want to buy shares in a multi-national pharmaceutical company.
sentences.chinese: 我想購買一家跨國醫藥公司的股票。

sentences.english: Most transnational corporations engaged in food marketing have done both.
sentences.chinese: 大多數從事食品營銷的跨國公司都在雙管齊下。

sentences.english: Globalization also means the development of multinational corporations and transnational corporations.
sentences.chinese: 全球化包括多國公司和跨國公司的成長。

sentences.english: One multinational beverage producer immediately retaliated with threats of an investment freeze.
sentences.chinese: 一家跨國飲料商立即予以反擊，威脅將凍結投資。

sentences.english: Can the sole proprietorship tendency of the transnational companies in China be reversed?
sentences.chinese: 在華跨國公司的獨資化傾向有可能被扭轉嗎？

sentences.english: Accident of this sort does unavoidably occur in cross-country shipping.
sentences.chinese: 在跨國裝運中，這類事故的發生是不可避免的。

definition: e-commerce (abbr. for 電子商務|电子商务[dian4 zi3 shang1 wu4])/(old) to negotiate by telegram or telephone
domestic and international/at home and abroad
bilateral/both shores/both sides/both coasts/Taiwan and mainland
to join up/to dock/a joint (between components)
student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
